overview: Thanks to the creativity of former North Carolina policeman Mitchell Smith, fitness superhero Aerobo Cop is on the case against childhood obesity -- a problem that's reaching a crisis level in the United States. Aimed at youngsters ages 4 through 12, this instructional video -- which conveys the enormous value of exercise and the lasting benefits of proper nutrition -- will have your kids itching to work out.
title: Aerobo Cop: Superhero of Fitness
